sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This script updates the max_characters system property from the max_concatenation system property.</description> <name>Update maximum SMS message length</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var maxConcatenation = gs.getProperty('glide.notify.sms.max_concatenation'); if (maxConcatenation && maxConcatenation != '10') { gs.setProperty("glide.notify.sms.max_characters",(maxConcatenation * 160).toString()); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-07 15:08:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3f36b980ff2230106c1ef9a7cddcbde5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update maximum SMS message length</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Notify" source="com.snc.notify">b567f9452f140110d8a4d5f62799b6e4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3f36b980ff2230106c1ef9a7cddcbde5</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-13 13:21:17</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
